title: Update to Cyber Puppet with new gestures and interactive 3D model

requirements.text: Change the main heading text from 'Control the Digital World with Your Hand Gestures' to 'Cyber Puppet'
acceptanceCriteria: The main page heading displays 'Cyber Puppet' as the title
The heading maintains its current centered position and styling

requirements.text: Add a subheading 'Project by 2nd AIML Students' below the main heading

quotes: the sub heading as "Project by 2nd AIML Students."

acceptanceCriteria: A subheading displaying 'Project by 2nd AIML Students' appears directly below the main heading
The subheading uses appropriate styling that complements the main heading

requirements.text: Replace the current 3D robot model with a more interactive style that features a rotating turntable/platform beneath the model

quotes: change the 3d model robot into different style which is more interactive and rotate table

acceptanceCriteria: The 3D model displays on a visible rotating turntable or platform
The turntable continuously rotates smoothly
The model maintains compatibility with skeletal animations for gesture responses
The overall visual style appears more interactive and engaging than the previous model

requirements.text: Update index finger up gesture to trigger 'yay' voice feedback and make the 3D model jump

quotes: index finger= say yay and the doll should jump

acceptanceCriteria: When only the index finger is extended, the system speaks 'yay'
The 3D model performs a jump animation in response
The gesture status display shows the active gesture

requirements.text: Update index and middle fingers up gesture to trigger 'peace bro' voice feedback and make the 3D model rotate

quotes: index+middle finger= say peace bro and the doll should rotate

acceptanceCriteria: When index and middle fingers are extended, the system speaks 'peace bro'
The 3D model performs a rotation animation in response
The gesture status display shows the active gesture

requirements.text: Update index, middle, and ring fingers up gesture to trigger 'i love you' voice feedback and make the 3D model raise both hands

quotes: index+middle+ring finger= say i love you and the doll should raise both hands

acceptanceCriteria: When index, middle, and ring fingers are extended, the system speaks 'i love you'
The 3D model raises both hands upward in response
The gesture status display shows the active gesture

requirements.text: Update all five fingers up gesture to trigger 'hi buddy' voice feedback and make the 3D model wave its right hand

quotes: index+middle+ring+pinky+thumb  finger = say hi buddy and the doll should wave right hand

acceptanceCriteria: When all five fingers are extended, the system speaks 'hi buddy'
The 3D model waves its right hand in response
The gesture status display shows the active gesture

requirements.text: Update index and pinky fingers up gesture to trigger 'yo yo' voice feedback and make the 3D model move backward

quotes: index+pinky finger = say yo yo and the doll should move backward

acceptanceCriteria: When index and pinky fingers are extended, the system speaks 'yo yo'
The 3D model moves backward on the platform
The gesture status display shows the active gesture

requirements.text: Update thumbs up gesture to trigger 'good job' voice feedback and make the 3D model clap its hands

quotes: thumb finger  up= say good job and the doll should clap

acceptanceCriteria: When the thumb is extended upward, the system speaks 'good job'
The 3D model performs a clapping animation with both hands
The gesture status display shows the active gesture

requirements.text: Update closed fist gesture to trigger 'come on fight' voice feedback and make the 3D model move forward

quotes: closed fist= come on fight and the doll should move forward

acceptanceCriteria: When all fingers are closed in a fist, the system speaks 'come on fight'
The 3D model moves forward on the platform
The gesture status display shows the active gesture

requirements.text: Update the instructions modal to reflect all new gesture mappings and their corresponding actions
acceptanceCriteria: The instructions modal displays all updated gesture-to-action mappings
Each gesture entry shows the finger positions, voice feedback text, and model animation
The modal remains accessible via the Instructions button

constraints: Maintain compatibility with MediaPipe Hands library for gesture detection
Preserve the existing camera preview and gesture status display functionality
Keep the dark gradient background theme and OKLCH color system
Do not modify the Internet Identity authentication hooks or main.tsx
Ensure all animations remain smooth with FPS optimization
nonGoals: Changing the overall page layout structure
Modifying the camera permission flow or error handling
Altering the sound toggle or loading screen components
Adding new gesture types beyond the specified seven
